description:
This module introduces students to the design and
implementation of fundamental data structures and
algorithms. The module covers basic data structures
(linked lists, stacks, queues, hash tables, binary heaps,
trees, and graphs), searching and sorting algorithms, and
basic analysis of algorithms.
title: Data Structures and Algorithms
prerequisite: (MA1100 or (CS1231 or its equivalent)) and (CS1010 or its equivalent)
